DocAttribute.Name: HasQuantities
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of physical quantities that are grouped by this complex physical quantity according to a given discrimination.

DocAttribute.Name: Discrimination
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identification of the discrimination by which this physical complex property is distinguished. Examples of discriminations are 'layer', 'steel bar diameter', etc.

DocAttribute.Name: Quality
DocAttribute.Documentation: Additional indication of a quality of the quantities that are grouped under this physical complex quantity.

DocAttribute.Name: Usage
DocAttribute.Documentation: Additional indication of a usage type of the quantities that are grouped under this physical complex quantity.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The IfcPhysicalComplexQuantity should not reference itself within the list of HasQuantities.
